name: .AB
summary: Learn about .AB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use Android Debug Bridge (cross-platform) to restore an AB file to an Android device. To do so:
Make sure USB debugging is enabled on your Android device.
Make sure the backup.ab file you intend to use to restore your device is located in the same directory as ADB (usually android_sdk/â€‹platform-tools).
Connect your device to your PC.
Open a terminal window and navigate to the directory in which ADB is located .
Execute the command adb restore backup.ab.

You can also use some third-party Android device managers and backup tools to restore the backup an AB file contains. For example, Droid Explorer (Windows) allows users to restore backups saved as AB files.
